name: Summer Meetings
description:
*The game is in production, screens and description might not represent the final work and could be changed in the future.*



When Ryuto came back to his hometown from university during summer vacations, he didn’t expect who he’d meet. These meetings might just be summer flings or something that will change lives.

Will he have an unforgettable summer? If so, why?


  • multiple choices leading to various endings
  • genre can change depending on your actions – from a peaceful story to a drama
  • five different heroines you can hang out with… or more
  • story and character’s reactions change depending on what your choices are
  • several hours of content (alternative scenarios)
